channel.title: How do i make an avatar and signature with a pic on it?
channel.description: :)im new to these forums and i read the instructions on the help thing, i still dont get how to put an avatar on and display pic someone help plzzz.

item.title: How do i make an avatar and signature with a pic on it?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Mopar has disabled avatars completely, and there are no images aloud in the signaturs. Sorry xD

If you want a picture in your sig, just put the following:

Here’s my signature - “InsertImageLinkHere”

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an avatar and signature with a pic on it?
